name: edusync-dynamic-scheduler
description: A comprehensive educational scheduling system with AI-powered optimization

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-all && npm run build
scripts.render-build: npm run install-all && npm run build

author: Angad
